channel.title: CVE Feed for Joel Starnes -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Joel Starnes -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-27196|2024-03-15T12:48:43.588Z -- Joel Starnes -- postMash – custom post order
item.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Joel Starnes postMash – custom post order allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects postMash – custom post order: from n/a through 1.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-31087|2024-03-31T19:32:04.962Z -- Joel Starnes -- pageMash > Page Management
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Joel Starnes pageMash > Page Management allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects pageMash > Page Management: from n/a through 1.3.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-25927|2024-02-28T12:47:34.550Z -- Joel Starnes -- postMash – custom post order
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Joel Starnes postMash – custom post order.This issue affects postMash – custom post order: from n/a through 1.2.0.
